name: SurReal: Subway VR
description:
Game introduction

it's definitely time the subway stopped running.
But I got on the subway to get home from work.
It was not the usual subway.

Depending on your behavior, ghosts attack you.
Escape the subway with caution against ghosts.

Recommend to these user.

VR equipment is ready.

like horror games.

When a friend or guest visits
(who has a good reaction, timid More better)
